DataElement.preferredName: Consent Form Patient Responsible Person Signed Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no question related to signature on a document explaining all relevant study information to assist the study volunteer in understanding the expectations and requirements of participation in a clinical trial by patient and person conducting the form discussion.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Consent Form Patient Responsible Person Signed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to signature on a document explaining all relevant study information to assist the study volunteer in understanding the expectations and requirements of participation in a clinical trial by patient and person conducting the form discussion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A document explaining all relevant study information to assist the study volunteer in understanding the expectations and requirements of participation in a clinical trial. This document is presented to and signed by the study subject. (from centerwatch.com glossary)

Concepts.definition: A document explaining all the relevant information to assist an individual in understanding the expectations and risks in making a decision about a procedure. This document is presented to and signed by the individual or guardian.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A person worthy of responsibility or trust or one held accountable.:Signed; having a handwritten signature.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A person worthy of responsibility or trust or one held accountable.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCIC CRF:National Cancer Institute of Canada Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has informed consent been sig
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has informed consent been signed and dated by patient and person conducting consent form discussion

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the subject signed and dated the IRB-approved informed consent form or assent form for individuals under 18 years old

ReferenceDocuments.name: UAMS consent
ReferenceDocuments.description: Subject or subject's authorized representative must be able to understand, read, and sign the study specific informed consent form after the nature of the study has been fully explained to them.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the Informed Consent Form been signed and dated by the patient and Investigator?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient sign an approved informed consent and authorization permitting release of personal health information?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient sign an IRB-approved consent form that conforms to federal and institutional guidelines?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the participant sign and date an IRB-approved consent form that conforms to federal and institutional guidelines?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient sign an IRB-approved consent form that conforms to federal and institutional guidelines?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient or a legally authorized representative provided study-specific informed consent prior to study entry and, for patients treated in the U.S., authorization permitting release of personal health information?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient or a legally authorized representative provided study-specific informed consent prior to pre-entry/Step 1 and, for patients treated in the U.S., authorization permitting release of personal health information?

DataElement.origin: NCIC CRF:National Cancer Institute of Canada Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Patient Consent Ind-2 2018303v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 11.09.2023 Added AQT per request ticket CADSR0003062_  mmt
